titles: A nevv carroll compyled by a burgesse of Perth, to be sung at Easter next 1641. which is the next great episcopall feast after Christmasse: to be sung to the tune of Gra-mercie good Scot.
notes: Verse: "VVHen Jock of broad Scotland went South to complain ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
